attributes.action: Create a statue of Boris Johnson in parliament square if we leave the EU
attributes.additional_details: The UK is the oldest democracy in the world and the world needs to see that democracy is alive and free in the UK, as an example to the whole world, as we enter a new world of democracy and freedom
attributes.background: The democratic referendum of 17.4 million voted to leave the EU and if we leave on this date, we should honour the PM who delivered this and gave the UK it’s infependeance back

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the granting of planning permission in Parliament Square is a matter for Westminster City Council and not the UK Government or Parliament.
